name: Stealth Minion Under-Cover Story: Sneak Into The Black-List Marine Division Cell
name_original: Stealth Minion Under-Cover Story: Sneak Into The Black-List Marine Division Cell
description: You are freakish agent. Freakish? Yeah, no one really knows what you are supposed to be.. But you're still an agent which is pretty neat! You are breaking into the Blacklist Marine prison, full of security cameras, guards, robots, and traps to keep unwanted company OUT!
